Flash Briefing Skill

des:
Jolley Talk by Matthew Jolley is a daily motivational briefing that engages with an audience that suffer mental health, depression, and anxiety! Wake up every morning to ensure that you get the most sufficient inspirational tips to overcome your battles and insecurities! This is for educational and entertainment purposes only. I am not a doctor

StayJolley
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
